description.narrative: A social movement created to advance child rights through positive individual behavior and social change, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Development effectiveness evidence and rights-based, results oriented country programme in line with national, regional and global strategies and priorities, and in development and emergency contexts.

mailing-address.narrative: Winston Churchill Avenue P.O. Box 1181 Yaoundé

sector.narrative: Technical assistance - Cross-sectoral communication for development

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: A social movement created to advance child rights through positive individual behavior and social change

description.narrative: In order to create a social movement, steps have been taken such as support for the development of C4D strategies, capacity building for social actors and media, coordination and social accountability platforms, the development of strategic partnerships. The next step is to produce the national C4D strategy. | Status: | As-of Date:
